ee wenuwen awashya yatithala pahasukam sanwardhanaya saha manga penwima danatamath sidukaragena yana bawada awashya ilakkaya kara langawimata hakiyawa labenu athayi da shri lanka sancharaka prawardhana karyanshaya wishwasaya palakarayi.me wasare gathawu sama masayakadima pera wasare adala masayata sapekshawa wideshiya sancharakayange paminime wardhanayak pennum kara thibena athara 2013 wasare di meratata pamina thibena wideshiya sancharakayange samastha sankhyawa 1,274,593 k bawada ema karyanshaya penwa deyi.ee anuwa me wasare gatha wu mulmasa hathaka kalaye di batahira yuropiya ratawalin sancharakayan wadi washayen meratata pamina thibe.

mese marana danduwama niyama wuye gandara polis wasame padinchiwa siti pushpakaran mithra kumara, priyani karunanayaka, ranjani karunanayaka, ayirangani karunanayaka, sanjiwa priyantha jayasinha yana ayataya. 2009 janawari 15 wanida ho eeta aasanna dinayakadi dikwalla kottagoda pradeshayedi ilangasinha chandradasa (44) yana ayata poluwalin paharadi maranaya sidukirima sambandhayen mema withthikaruwanta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya wisin mathara mahadhikaranaye adhi chodana gonu karanu laba thibini.
